# squarerootofnumber

This program calculates the square root of the number using al-Khwarizm method. the output is shown as follows

|Number |SquareRoot|
|-------|----------|
|1  |1            |
|2  |1.41421568627|
|3  |1.73205081001|
|4  |2            |

|6  |2.44948979592|
